name: YeeBall
description:
A silly and dumb game I made as a joke because my good chum Abby couldn't figure out an anagram that was meant to read "EYEBALL" and was stuck on "YEEBALL" for a good 5 minutes. Love you, Abby!

INSTRUCTIONS:

-Use your mouse to adjust the arrow to the direction you want to yeet your ball.

-Then click down with the left mouse button and hold- this will trigger the power meter to start.

-Let go of the left mouse button when the meter is at the desired power level to fire.

FAQ:

1. This game seems janky af. The ball clips through the machine sometimes.

A: I know. I couldn't fix it after hours of trying and I refuse to ruin my mental health over a joke project called "YeeBall"

2. The ball is stuck on the machine and now I can't play!
A: Impatient, much? The ball despawns and lets you try again after 10 seconds. Just wait, bruh.

3: What's the best ice cream flavor?

A: Black raspberry with chocolate pieces.
